resources.string: This is Sample application i.e,Alarm Clock here using the concept of UI layout design and the java programming language to build the logic of the project user of this application may experience the few seconds of lagging alarm receiving due to some sequential executing of the instructions and also its built using the basic concept related to app development.
User can set multiple alarms and can turn ON/OFF alarm with toggle Button
User will receive Notification with background music which will be binded with user interaction
Other features such as stop wacth and notes feature where integrated with the application. The application built with help of Android documentation.
App was built by Nishanth for more queries.....
others can free to develop this to the next level
